name: KatalonExtensionTask
description: This Plugin is for execute Katalon Project in Azure Devops
author: Katalon

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Download Katalon Studio version
inputs.helpMarkDown: E.g. `5.10.1`. The list of all releases can be retrieved from [here](https://github.com/katalon-studio/katalon-studio/releases).

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Use pre-installed Katalon Studio
inputs.helpMarkDown: E.g. `/var/lib/azureDevops/Katalon_Studio_Linux_64-5.10.1`. Use this field when Katalon Studio cannot be downloaded automatically (often due to network conditions).

inputs.name: executeArgs
inputs.label: Command arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: E.g. `-browserType="Chrome" -retry=0 -statusDelay=15 -testSuitePath="Test Suites/Regression Tests/All tests"`. Please leave out `-runMode`. If not specified, `-projectPath` will be set to the current workspace directory.

inputs.name: x11Display
inputs.label: X11 DISPLAY (for Linux)
inputs.helpMarkDown: E.g. `:1`. This value will be used as the `DISPLAY` environment variable. Azzure Devops must be allowed to connect to the display, see `xhost` if you encounter access control issues.

inputs.name: xvfbConfiguration
inputs.label: Xvfb-run configuration (for Linux)
inputs.helpMarkDown: E.g. `-a -n 0 -s "-screen 0 1024x768x24"`. If specified, `xvfb-run` will be used. Please make sure Xvfb has been installed.
